EmailTemplate.name: Russian Classes for Parents
EmailTemplate.subject: Russian Lessons for Parents
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents, Mrs Lilia Andreeva, a parent in the school is offering our school community a great opportunity to learn Russian. Her advertisement is outlined below...... Russian Conversational classes for school parents during after school club activities.
Tuesday- Beginners 3:30- 4:30 Upper Campus
Wednesday- Intermediate 3:30 - 4:30 Upper campus
This is a great opportunity for all to break down the barrier and talk in Russian!
If you would like to take advantage of such a great opportunity, please contact Lilia directly onlilia-andreeva@yandex.ru These lessons will commence on the 20th September, 2011.
